CustomField.formula:
"If you have submitted a paper application, your "+ Registration_Type__c +" "+ Registration__r.Application_Type__c +" number "+ Registration_Number__c +" must be included on ALL items. If this number is not included, this alone will delay the processing of your application." +BR()+BR()+ IF(Registration_Type__c = "Car Wash", "If you have any questions regarding the above, please call (510) 285-3502, email DLSELicensing@dir.ca.gov, or fax requested item(s) to ", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Talent", "If you have any questions regarding the above, please call (510) 285-3397, email DLSELicensing@dir.ca.gov, or fax requested item(s) to ", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Garment", "If you have any questions regarding the above, please call (510) 285-3398, email CPSLicensing@dir.ca.gov, or fax requested item(s) to ", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Child Performer Services", "If you have any questions regarding the above, please call (510) 285-2123, email DLSELicensing@dir.ca.gov, or fax requested item(s) to (510) 286-1366", IF(Registration_Type__c = "Janitorial", "If you have any questions regarding the above, please call (510) 879-8333", ""))))) + IF( AND( Registration_Type__c = "FLC", CONTAINS(Office__c, "Fresno")), "(559) 248-1893, email FLC@dir.ca.gov, or fax requested item(s) to ", "") + IF( AND( Registration_Type__c = "FLC", CONTAINS(Office__c, "Oakland")), "(510) 285-3399, email FLC@dir.ca.gov, or fax requested item(s) to ", "") +
IF(AND(CONTAINS(Office__c, "Oakland"), (Registration_Type__c <> "Child Performer Services")), "(510) 286-1366.", IF(AND(CONTAINS(Office__c, "Fresno"), (Registration_Type__c <> "Child Performer Services")), "(559) 248-1895.", ""))
CustomField.label: Defect Text 3
